sections.heading: What is きっと?
sections.content:
きっと is an adverb expressing strong belief or confidence, meaning "surely," "certainly," "definitely," or "I'm sure." It shows the speaker's conviction that something will happen or is true.

きっと成功する "I'm sure it will succeed" きっと来る "He'll definitely come" きっと大丈夫 "It'll surely be okay"

children.heading: Expressing confidence
children.content: きっとうまくいく "It'll surely go well" きっと合格する "You'll definitely pass" Shows strong optimism Confident prediction

children.heading: Emphasizing certainty
children.content: きっとそうだ "That's surely so" きっと彼だ "It's definitely him" Strong conviction

children.heading: Encouraging others
children.content: きっとできるよ "You can surely do it" きっと良くなる "It'll definitely get better" Supportive, motivational

children.heading: きっと + だろう
children.content: きっと来るだろう "He'll surely come" きっと成功するだろう "It'll surely succeed" Double certainty marker Very confident

children.heading: きっと + はずだ
children.content: きっとうまくいくはずだ "It should surely go well" Logical expectation + confidence

children.heading: きっと + にちがいない
children.content: きっと彼にちがいない "It's surely him" Very strong conviction Almost redundant but emphatic

children.heading: きっと shows high confidence (75-90%)
children.content: 30-50%: たぶん (probably) 50-70%: おそらく (probably) 75-90%: きっと (surely) 90-95%: 絶対に (absolutely) きっと = strong belief

children.heading: Usually with positive outcomes
children.content: Natural: きっと成功する "Surely will succeed" Less common: きっと失敗する "Surely will fail" (sounds odd) きっと used mostly for positive expectations

children.heading: For negative, use たぶん
children.content: Better: たぶん失敗する "Probably will fail" Or: 失敗するかもしれない "Might fail" きっと rarely for negative predictions

children.heading: Encouragement
children.content: 大丈夫、きっとできる "It's okay, you can surely do it" きっとうまくいくよ "It'll surely go well" 諦めないで。きっと夢は叶う "Don't give up. Your dream will surely come true" Motivational contexts

children.heading: Predictions
children.content: きっと明日は晴れる "It'll surely be sunny tomorrow" きっと彼は来る "He'll definitely come" Confident forecasts

children.heading: Hope and wishes
children.content: きっと良くなる "It'll surely get better" きっと幸せになれる "You'll surely be happy" Optimistic hopes

children.heading: Beginning of sentence
children.content: きっと、君ならできる "Surely, you can do it" Emphasis at start

children.heading: Middle of sentence
children.content: 彼はきっと来る "He'll surely come" 君はきっと成功する "You'll surely succeed" Most common position

children.heading: Works in both
children.content: Casual: きっと大丈夫だよ "It'll surely be okay" Polite: きっと大丈夫です "It'll surely be okay" Same meaning, adjust verb ending

children.heading: きっと～よ (casual emphasis)
children.content: きっとうまくいくよ "It'll surely go well" きっとできるよ "You can surely do it" Friendly, encouraging

children.heading: きっと～から (because surely)
children.content: きっと成功するから、心配しないで "It'll surely succeed, so don't worry" 大丈夫、きっと来るから "It's okay, he'll surely come"

sections.heading: きっと vs たぶん

children.heading: きっと - Strong belief (75-90%)
children.content: きっと晴れる "It'll surely be sunny" More confident Optimistic

children.heading: たぶん - Moderate probability (50-70%)
children.content: たぶん晴れる "It'll probably be sunny" Less certain Neutral

children.heading: きっと - Surely (75-90%)
children.content: きっと成功する "It'll surely succeed" Strong but not absolute Room for doubt

children.heading: 絶対 - Absolutely (95%+)
children.content: 絶対に成功する "It'll absolutely succeed" Maximum confidence No doubt

children.heading: Not common with negative
children.content: Unnatural: きっと来ない ⚠️ Better: たぶん来ない ✓ Or: 来ないと思う ✓ きっと mainly for positive

children.heading: Shows optimism
children.content: きっと良くなる "It'll surely get better" きっと幸せになれる "You'll surely be happy" Positive outlook Hope and confidence

children.heading: Seeking confirmation
children.content: きっと成功するよね？ "It'll surely succeed, right?" きっと大丈夫だよね？ "It'll surely be okay, right?" Seeking reassurance

children.heading: Basic
children.content: きっと成功する "It'll surely succeed" きっと大丈夫 "It'll surely be okay" きっと来る "He'll definitely come"

children.heading: Intermediate
children.content: 頑張れば、きっと夢は叶う "If you try hard, your dream will surely come true" 心配しないで。きっとうまくいくから "Don't worry. It'll surely go well" きっと彼は理解してくれるはずだ "I'm sure he'll understand"

children.heading: Advanced
children.content: 困難な道のりだが、諦めなければ きっと成功する。信じて進み続けよう。 努力は必ず報われる。 "It's a difficult path, but if you don't give up, you'll surely succeed. Let's believe and keep going. Effort will definitely be rewarded." 今は辛いかもしれない。でも、 時間が経てば、きっと良い思い出になる。 この経験はきっと君を強くする。 "It might be tough now. But with time, it'll surely become a good memory. This experience will surely make you stronger."

sections.heading: Related Grammar Points
sections.content: たぶん - Probably (moderate certainty) おそらく - Probably (formal) 絶対に - Absolutely (highest certainty) 必ず - Without fail/Certainly Certainty adverbs - Expressing probability
